deconvolutionlab

Class Lab

  • java.lang.Object
    • deconvolutionlab.Lab

  • public class Lab
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains a collection of useful static methods to manage all the peripherical aspects of the deconvolution, such as load, display, or save an image.

    At the construction of the class, the config is loaded. In practice, any deconvolution program has to start with Lab.init(Platform).

    Author:
    Daniel Sage
